thread.title: Dissatisfied with products and return fee
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Dissatisfied with products and return fee

author: Dissatisfied with products and return fee
title: Dissatisfied with products and return fee
text: I was not satisfied with the wigs I received, one did not fit properly even when making adjustments to the straps. And the other wig was not my preferred style. I returned the wigs in the plastic bags with tags and description still attached to the wigs. I was rejected a refund because the boxes where not included, isn't that what the 20 percent restocking fee covers.!!
